title: Logger - prettier nested errors
body:
Currently the logger prints nested errors in a not readable way due to the nested error stacks. 

```
2021-01-09 13:04:21 [SYNC]            error: Downloaded batch error id=2224 method=beacon_blocks_by_range, encoding=ssz_snappy, peer=16Uiu2HAmGHE8NGyLeHgaMYaRNFuFZmituhihUc2GgzJgdYq1HMB8, code=REQUEST_ERROR_DIAL_ERROR, error={"message":"
    Error: Error occurred during XX handshake: Error occurred while verifying signed payload: Peer ID doesn't match libp2p public key.
        at Noise.performXXHandshake (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/libp2p-noise/src/noise.ts:211:13)
        at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
    Error: connection error 172.17.0.4:9000: connect EHOSTUNREACH 172.17.0.4:9000
    Error: The operation was aborted
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/libp2p-tcp/src/index.js:86:14)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
    Error: The operation was aborted
        at nextAbortHandler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abortable-iterator/index.js:37:20)
        at AbortSignal.abortHandler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abortable-iterator/index.js:16:29)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)","stack":"AggregateError: 
    Error: Error occurred during XX handshake: Error occurred while verifying signed payload: Peer ID doesn't match libp2p public key.
        at Noise.performXXHandshake (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/libp2p-noise/src/noise.ts:211:13)
        at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
    Error: connection error 172.17.0.4:9000: connect EHOSTUNREACH 172.17.0.4:9000
    Error: The operation was aborted
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/libp2p-tcp/src/index.js:86:14)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
    Error: The operation was aborted
        at nextAbortHandler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abortable-iterator/index.js:37:20)
        at AbortSignal.abortHandler (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abortable-iterator/index.js:16:29)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)
        at AbortSignal.dispatchEvent (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/event-target-shim/src/event-target.mjs:337:35)
        at abortSignal (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-signal.ts:68:12)
        at AbortController.abort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/abort-controller/src/abort-controller.ts:26:9)
        at AbortSignal.onAbort (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/any-signal/index.js:13:16)
    at maybeSettle (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/p-some/index.js:31:11)
    at /home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/node_modules/p-some/index.js:69:23"} 
Error: REQUEST_ERROR_DIAL_ERROR
    at sendRequest (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/network/reqresp/request/index.ts:134:13)
```

Instead, the error stacks should be detected and extracted and maybe print in an indented sequence or one after the other at the end of the logline
